_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Knowing and seeing the six sense bases a: the eye, sights, eye consciousness, and eye contact
the ear, sounds, ear consciousness, and ear contact
the nose, smells, nose consciousness, and nose contact
the tongue, tastes, tongue consciousness, and tongue contact
the body, touches, body consciousness, and body contact
the mind, thoughts, mind consciousness, and mind contact
Knowing and seeing the pleasant, painful: the pleasant, painful, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by eye contact
the pleasant, painful, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by ear contact
the pleasant, painful, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by nose contact
the pleasant, painful, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by tongue contact
the pleasant, painful, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by body contact
the pleasant, painful, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by mind contact
